meanings.definition: To pass from one to another or back and forth; give and take; trade; exchange.
meanings.sent1: The children were bandying toys during playtime.
meanings.sent2: The friends were bandying jokes at the party.

meanings.sent4: The ideas were bandying around the meeting room like a game of catch.
meanings.sent5: The rumors were bandying about the school, spreading quickly.
